modName: Improved Dragon Priest Hood Normal Map
summary: I made a brand new normal map for the Dragon Priest hood (as opposed to editing the existing one). I wanted more depth to it, and I\'m very happy with the final result.
descriptionHtml:
Improved Dragon Priest Normal Map v1.0 - by THEWULFMAN

Description:
I made a brand new normal map for the Dragon Priest hood (as opposed to editing the existing one). I wanted more depth to it, and I\'m very happy with the final result. 

Same texture size, so you\'ll have 0 performance loss. It\'s a small change, but I like it, and I hope everyone else does too.


Notes: This is the first normal map I changed of many. I eventually will be changing a LOT of them. I might make it into a large pack of all of them, if I make enough of them.

Please remember to endorse if you liked it, it\'s the best way to show appreciation to a modder.

Installation:
Copy the textures folder to your Skyrim\\data folder. 

This mod can be used with other texture mods. Just install it after your desired texture mod, and this normal map will be the one used.

Uninstallation: 
Delete the dragonpriesthood_n.dds file located in Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\dragonpriesthelm.

Credits
-Bethesda
-THEWULFMAN
author: THEWULFMAN
